item.description:
This should be a good show in such a small venue. Tix are available now for $27.50 (plus any surchanges).

Los Lonely Boys are an American Grammy-winning musical rock band from San Angelo, Texas. They play a style of music which they dub as Texican Rock n' Roll, combining elements of rock and roll, blues, soul, country, and Tejano. Their influences include Stevie Ray Vaughan, Santana, and Ritchie Valens.

The group frequently headlines tours, and has also performed with music legends such as Willie Nelson, ZZ Top, The Rolling Stones, Tim McGraw, Ronnie Milsap and Carlos Santana.

LosLonelyBoys.com

Tickets available at http://www.ticketmast...
item.name: Los Lonely Boys at Paradise
